title: INtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The 43 Best Movies on Netflix Right Now (March 2025)
items.description: Plankton: The Movie, Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse, and Troll are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

items.title: Meta settles UK ‘right to object to ad-tracking’ lawsuit by agreeing not to track plaintiff
items.description: A human rights campaigner, Tanya O’Carroll, has succeeded in forcing social media giant Meta not to use her data for targeted advertising. The agreeme...

items.title: 17 Best Early Amazon Spring Sale Deals (2025)
items.description: Now’s your chance to save on headphones, tablets, and home gadgets.

items.title: 13 Best Hair Straighteners We Tested (2025) | WIRED
items.description: Curls and waves are beautiful. But when you want to smooth them out, these hot tools—irons, brushes, and combs—work wonders.

items.title: A Mysterious Startup Is Developing a New Form of Solar Geoengineering
items.description: Stardust, an Israeli–US startup, intends to patent its unique aerosol technology for temporarily cooling the planet.

items.title: The Art of the Perfect Nap
items.description: Done wisely, naps can be a valuable way to boost your focus and energy. A sleep researcher explains how to get it right.

items.title: Valve removes video game demo suspected of being malware
items.description: Valve removed a video game called Sniper: Phantom's Resolution from Steam after users reported that its free demo contained malware.

items.title: Anduril might build a weapons factory in the UK
items.description: Anduril might build a factory in the U.K. as it expands beyond U.S. defense contracts.

items.title: Meta has revenue sharing agreements with Llama AI model hosts, filing reveals
items.description: In a blog post last July, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg said that “selling access” to Meta’s openly available Llama AI models “isn’t [Meta’s] business mode...

items.title: How BYD plans to make EV charging as fast as filling a gas tank
items.description: What we found mostly supports the auto makers claims, with a few caveats.
